ingredients.item: 280g pack Waitrose Boneless Scottish Salmon fillets, skinned

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.
Sprinkle the cajun seasoning over the salmon and place in a greased roasting tin with the tomatoes, then bake for 15 minutes until cooked through.

Place the rocket on the sourdough and add the tomatoes, crushing slightly with a spoon. Break the salmon into large flakes and place on top. Add a spoonful of crème fraÎche and drizzle over any juices.
